isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Vibration Damper, Crankshaft, Main Bearings, Flywheel, and Crankcase - Install - Install Oil Level Gauge Tube Assembly

svcproc.title: Install Oil Level Gauge Tube Assembly

step1.para: Apply Loctite® around entire circumference of lower oil level gauge tube and casting.
Press lower oil level gauge tube in until bead is seated in chamber of crankcase.

note.para: Slots in oil level gauge tube need not be oriented in any special manner.

step1.para: Install new O-ring gasket on oil level filler tube.
Insert oil level filler tube in oil level gauge tube and orient oil filler tube to the rear and as far inboard as possible.
Tighten oil filler tube clamp screw to " Special Torque ."
